title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

General Considerations

For Task A1, the response must describe the party control of government when the bill was passed.

For Task A2, the response must explain how that party control could have affected the process by which the bill described above became a law.

For Task B, the response must explain why a Democratic member of the House of Representatives following the delegate model of representation might have cast a vote in favor of this bill.

For Task C1, the response must describe a part of the executive branch, other than the president, that could affect this legislation after its passage.

For Task C2, the response must explain how that part of the executive branch might affect the success of this legislation.
descriptions: The response accomplishes none of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes any one of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes any two of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes any three of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes any four of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes any five of the tasks set by the question.
